title: WTT: 4 E106 beaters for T206 - ALL SOLD/TRADED
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: WTT: 4 E106 beaters for T206 - ALL SOLD/TRADED
posts.post_content:
These were picked up in a beater lot.  All were soaked in tap water to remove paper.  You know what I like, make me an offer.

NOTE THAT THE ZIMMERMAN HAS BEEN SOLD.
Those sure have a lot of character and visual appeal for their level of beater-ness.
